message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
I'm really interested in the product, but $175 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $120 for it. Can we meet in the middle somewhere?
I understand you're looking for a compromise, Bob. I can do $145, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. What do you think?

I appreciate your flexibility, but $145 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'd be willing to pay $130 for the product. Can we make a deal at this price?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I can do $140, but I'm getting close to my minimum price. What do you think?
I really like the product, but I'm trying to be mindful of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $125 for it. Can we meet at this price?
I'm getting closer to my minimum price, Bob. I can do $135, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $135 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'd be willing to pay $130. Can we make a deal at this price?
Bob, we've been negotiating for a while, and I'm not willing to go any lower than $135. I think we're close, but I need to make a living. Can you meet me at $135?

I understand you're trying to make a living, Alice, but I'm really not comfortable with $135. I'm willing to walk away and buy the product from John for $100 if we can't meet in the middle. I'd be willing to pay $128 for the product. Can we make a deal at this price?
